title: Kat Pole dance animation
body:
First, I'd like to say that I'm a female gamer and doctor. 

Second, I realize that it has been a while since the change of animation for Kat, however i just wanted to express how deeply it still upsets me that it was taken down. 

As female gamer and I am really upset that riot changed the animation. Some girls dance on poles. Its a legal profession which they chose and get paid for and now it is a popular exercise program as well. I don't think that the animation was offensive. As it was depicting a legal and normal activity. I feel that if I want to buy the skin and express my femininity by dancing on a pole i should be able to do so.  

I realize that some people may not be so fond of the animation, and so all i propose (and beg for) is a simple check box accompanying the skin allowing you to select whether or not you'd like to dance on a pole.  

Merry Snowdown!!!!!!!

replies.body:
"First, I'd like to say that I'm a female gamer and doctor."
"female gamer"
**Female gamer**
nothing to see here folks
To be fair, they probably just mentioned that as a matter of perspective because people tend to assume if you're a male saying something of this nature you're a sexist pig.

> [{quoted}](name=Ginnjii,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AlT36nBT,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-20T19:09:37.635+0000)
>
> To be fair, they probably just mentioned that as a matter of perspective because people tend to assume if you're a male saying something of this nature you're a sexist pig.

sexist means you hate the opposite gender, and i really don't think anyone would really care if it was a  guy saying this, most agree that the pole dancing animation shouldn't of been taking away.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bmurGIqiPgg

on a serious note, i think this also has to do with graves cigar getting removed because it promoted tobacco usage. as you can see at the very beginning of rek'sai trailer. i think the pole dancing was removed because riot found it to suggestive for the T esbr rating.

You're right, and people shouldn't care, but some do so what I was saying was that, that might be why they said what they said. As for the rating, I'm not sure if that was why the pole dancing was removed because correct me if I'm mistaken but doesn't Nidalee have the same suggestive sort of dance with her spear?

> [{quoted}](name=Ginnjii,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AlT36nBT,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-20T19:24:26.512+0000)
>
> You're right, and people shouldn't care, but some do so what I was saying was that, that might be why they said what they said. As for the rating, I'm not sure if that was why the pole dancing was removed because correct me if I'm mistaken but doesn't Nidalee have the same suggestive sort of dance with her spear?

yeah, but honestly who cares, let people have their own little opinons about a person they never met or will meet, also nidalee was just probably overlooked, i think riot doesn't care so long as their not being threatened by someone or something.
I believe they also changed nid's dance. The length I believe.

TBH, I think that this idea of League's depicition of women being nothing but bimbos with breasts the size of their head (not saying it's not represented at all... {{champion:103}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:37}}), has never held up weight since the very beginning ({{champion:34}} {{champion:1}}), but now, it's safe to say that that idea is complete horseshit.  Out of the last 5 female champions that have been released we have; a scary void creature who is female in name alone (i.e. no sexual characteristics whatsoever) {{champion:421}} , a lich who's only sexy if you enjoy claws and necrophilia {{champion:429}}, a flat chested albino who's batshit crazy, and the only thing remotely sexualizing her is her combat bikini {{champion:222}}, an ice witch who's human characteristics are marred by being mostly ice {{champion:127}}, and an extremely conservatively dressed, yet beautiful girl who has a fondness for birds and knock-knock jokes {{champion:133}}.  But yes, please explain to me how we're oppressing an objectifying women. I'm just glad there's women like OP who can see past the feminazi bullshit.

To be fair about {{champion:127}} and {{champion:133}}, Lissandra seems to have some fair sized balloons there. And Quinn's boobs are also very nice. Too bad I'm distracted by their beautiful faces to never look lower.

Just because they have large breasts, doesn't mean they're sexualized. When people say Quinn and Lissandra, the first thing that pops into my head isn't their breasts, it's how damn annoying they are to face top lane.
You can't say all women who have breasts larger than an A cup are sexualized, because then show me how {{champion:10}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:92}} (Ignoring Battlebunny, that's a skin and doesn't fully count.) {{champion:102}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:18}} are sexualized. Each of these champions has breasts, some of them are fairly large, but very few of them are actually sexualized. Saying they "have some fair sized balloons there." isn't being fair at all.

Wellllll.... I understand the point you're trying to make, but I'd have to say at the very least Leblanc and Vi are sexualized (LeBlanc is wearing practically nothing, and Vi has a bubble butt on her basic skin.)  However I agree with you, big boobs doesn't necessarily mean sexualization.

Idk about LeBlanc, maybe you could say she's sort of like Cass who can also decieve people with good looks and being sensual bur for Vi, the majority of female athletes end up having bubble butts and Vi is on the more athletic spectrum of female champs. But you can always nitpick shit like that. Unlike with champs like Ahri or MF, the first, second and third things you think off when you see Vi isn't "Ooh, bubble butt". Rather, it's 
1. "**** those punches hurt" 
2. "How the hell does she carry those damn gloves with her stick-like arms"
3. "Her hair looks pretty cool"

I would agree and disagree. Yes having large breasts does not mean sexualized. However the way that riot creates its champions is that most female champs are sexualized. To a extent this makes sense because the people who would actually be fighting in league would be the top of their class and this is reflected by male and female champs. However that doesn't mean every champ has to be sexualized and I personally would enjoy more monster champs for one and more quirky champs like Gragas and hiemer. As far as I am concerned you do not have to be athletic and a Olympic athlete to be in the league and we should have that reflected with more quirky and monsters. Rek'sai is a great addition and love her and would love to see more like her. 

Also a complaint that I think is fair is that when you look at the art of most of the female champs in league you will see that most you will know they have breasts because of the way the art is done. This bothers me because it makes the art samey and kind of makes me feel like it is lazy. Here is what I mean. In {{champion:131}} splash [(http://i.ytimg.com/vi/-vVitMqWQDc/maxresdefault.jpg)] you will notice that the armor she wears doesn't push boobs into your face but everything down to the high heels screams that she is a woman. A very sexy woman. Now compare that to {{champion:89}} or {{champion:10}} who are both armored females but instead of armor that accents their character or their abilities we get armor that goes out of its way to show you just how big their boobs are. [(http://i.ytimg.com/vi/q4clnpomEwo/maxresdefault.jpg)] or [(http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TA9OyOPfy1I/VDwpOe6TikI/AAAAAAAAbJ8/a5CY8Pd7f4o/s1600/Kayle_Splash_0.jpg)]. Now their is a place for this type of stuff but that is primarily what Riot has put forward up to date and like I said before that makes it seem samey in terms of splashes. I think they should find more ways to accent the character not the boobs in both art and animation another example I think is good is aether wing kayle. [(http://img1.leaguecraft.com/lol-splash-art/asset/wallpaper_760px_7652.jpg)] again you can tell she is a sexy woman but it isn't necessarily because of boobs like in the other splash art. The complaint of over sexualizing females can get a bit stale and old but Riot time and time again can get stuck in their ways on how they think art should be done which isn't necessarily the best. Look at all the action poses that came out recently. Would it benefit, say heimer, to have a action pose? Or would it do him more justice to have say a pose that shows off how smart he is? Same with animation? Does the recall match the character or in this case, does the recall match the theme of the skin? In the case of snow down kat I think the recall totally does match the theme of the skin and should have been left.

I know this is a bit ranty but hopefully it helps you understand why some people have a problem with stuff like this.

katarina poll dancing?
I don't remember that.
I remember nidalee doing that.

I thought kat did a dance based on a song..or some famous person..will smith? idk
oh wait
maybe the christmas kat skin did do that.
I never bought that one.
I've had kitty kat since release.
It was on Slay Belle Katarina's recall.  Which made fuck all sense when Nidalee gets to pole dance all the time.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UqhgU6l6YEE

related
girl u know y most of the ppl playing is men is because of the fucking hot kitty kat katarina skin poledancing and fucking eve welp gg brb 20 min time to fap to katarina  and popstar ahri  peace

I think a big reason they removed it was because of how little it fit her character.  Katarina is a bloodthirsty predator, so the idea of her pole dancing seems... off.  If it had been a character like Ahri, whose character revolves around seduction, it would be FAR more fitting.

She's also a Noxian, and Noxus' idea is that women should be able to make up for their lack of being meatheads that sound like they swallowed brushes by being deceptive.  Cassiopeia, Kat's sister, was a seductress.  Kat is shown in tight leather armor, and despite being much more cold-blooded than your average seductress, if a New Dawn showed us anything, Kat still can show a little bit of sensuality.

Also, the reason why they had it removed was because of the feminazi QQs, despite the fact that Nidalee lives to pole dance to this day.
Well...they also removed graves cigar from his new splash art for cencorship.

Long story short (for those who just joined the thread):

Girls and boys alike are worried about the sized pixel boobs of the fictional champs among other sexual innuendos...

GG.

Yeah woman too and I agree... Nida can have it but Kat can't. Logic? Originally they said that it didn't fit Kata's character but then there are skins like Battle Bunny Riven for example. Yup, still no logic.

> [{quoted}](name=Nagirah,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AlT36nBT,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2014-12-21T04:26:59.020+0000)
>
> Yeah woman too and I agree... Nida can have it but Kat can't. Logic? Originally they said that it didn't fit Kata's character but then there are skins like Battle Bunny Riven for example. Yup, still no logic.

Playboy bunny Riven and Nidalee's pole dancing are also dumb as hell, hth.

The problem with Kat's animation is that *that's not Kat.* Their attempts at making her super sexualized are incredibly forced and unfitting for what her actual character is supposed to be. If that animation had been given to MF or Ahri or similar champions, people would've rolled their eyes because it's a lazy thing to do, but there would have been fewer complaints because it is at least consistent with their characters.

But then Riven wearing a Bunny Girl suit is even worse because atleast being sensual is a consistant theme throughout Noxus' women. Riven believes in honorable strength and she is fairly serious while also being ~~super edgy~~ the more strong-willed girl from Noxus.

Katarina, while not to the extent of LB or Cass, is still sensual.

Thank you for being a reasonable female. Agree 100% with you. Really these extremist feminists think they can control everything lol. Not like they are forced to buy the skin and everyone agrees with them, they don't understand a free market I suppose.

> [{quoted}](name=MiriOak,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AlT36nBT,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-20T18:59:32.276+0000)
>
> now it is a popular exercise program as well. 

This makes me think so guy at some excercise corporation was like "How dumb do you think these girls are, instead of us paying them to poledance THEY will pay us! mwahahashah.

On a more serious note nidalee still pole dances :P
I am more offended/disgusted by Evelynn or Taric...

They didn't change katarina's pole dance because of "lol censorship". Nidalee's is still untouched. They changed her pole dance because they felt like it didn't fit her character. And the recall they replaced it with definitely fits.
